name: Pyramid Chase
description:
Positive Thinking is key to escape Depression.  Thinking creates emotions so choose good thoughts to create emotions that make you feel good. 

Use the arrow keys to clear the mind from negative thoughts. Use the Space bar to activate the Flauros to clear every thought in the screen, beware you only have 3 of them.

credits: Music and sounds from The Original Silent Hill 2 game. Everything else @ansimuz
